results.description: Nottingham Forest sell American winger Gboly Ariyibi to Greek Super League side Panaitolikos for an undisclosed fee.
results.title: Gboly Ariyibi: Nottingham Forest sell winger to Greek side Panaitolikos

results.description: PAOK Salonika win the Greek Super League title for the first time in 34 years after beating Levadiakos at the Tomba Stadium.
results.title: PAOK Salonika win Greek league title for first time in 34 years

results.description: Hailed as a teenage talent by Arsene Wenger, Chuba Akpom is enjoying success in Greece after leaving boyhood club Arsenal.
results.shortTitle: Guns, fireworks & invincibility - Akpom at PAOK
results.title: Chuba Akpom: Ex-Arsenal forward set to become Greek 'Invincible' with PAOK

thumbnail.altText: PAOK's former Arsenal striker Chuba Akpom

results.description: Greek Super League side Panathinaikos are facing a points deduction after violence saw their derby game against city rivals Olympiakos abandoned.
results.title: Panathinaikos v Olympiakos: Athens derby abandoned after violence

thumbnail.altText: Riot police at the Olympic Stadium in Athens

results.description: Birmingham-born Adil Nabi started his career at West Brom, but is now playing in Greece - and believes he can inspire young British Asians.
results.shortTitle: 'Hopefully I can pave the way for British Asian players'
results.title: Adil Nabi: Ex-West Brom midfielder on playing with Roberto Carlos, Greece & inspiring youngsters

results.description: Winger Gil Dias leaves Nottingham Forest as his loan is cut short, allowing him to move to Greece with Olympiakos.
results.title: Gil Dias: Winger leaves Nottingham Forest for Greek giants Olympiakos

results.description: All Greek Super League games are suspended this weekend after referees go on strike following an official being attacked outside his house.
results.shortTitle: Greek league suspended after ref attack
results.title: Greek Super League suspended after ref attack

results.description: Former Manchester City midfielder Yaya Toure is welcomed by thousands of fans in Athens as he finalises a move to Olympiakos.
results.title: Yaya Toure: Olympiakos fans welcome former Manchester City player to Athens

results.description: Sporting Lisbon want compensation of up to 197m euros (£175m) for three players who terminated their contracts and have since joined other clubs.
results.shortTitle: Sporting seek £175m for trio who quit club
results.title: Sporting Lisbon: Portuguese club seek £175m compensation for three players

thumbnail.altText: Gelson Martins, Rui Patricio and Daniel Podence

results.description: Panathinaikos are banned from European competition for three years by the continent's football governing body after failing to pay their debts.
results.title: Panathinaikos: Greek club banned from European football for three years

results.description: Watch former Chelsea player Marko Marin take an unusual dive in a Greek Super League game between Olympiacos and Apollon Smyrnis.
results.shortTitle: Watch former Chelsea player Marin's comical tumble
results.title: Former Chelsea player Marko Marin makes comical tumble in Greek Super League

results.description: Olympiakos players are fined £350,000 and ordered to go on holiday by the club's president following poor results.
results.shortTitle: Players fined and told to 'go on holiday'
results.title: Olympiakos players fined £350,000 and ordered to 'go on holiday'

results.description: PAOK Salonika's president is banned for three years for coming onto the pitch with a gun during a Greek top-flight game against AEK Athens.
results.shortTitle: PAOK president banned for gun incident
results.title: PAOK Salonika: Gun incident sees Greek club's president banned

results.description: Hamilton sign former OFI Crete striker Marios Ogboe and have Carshalton Athletic forward Mickel Miller and Stirling Albion youth George Stanger on trial.
results.title: Marios Ogboe: Hamilton sign former OFI Crete striker

results.description: Everton forward Kevin Mirallas rejoins Greek club Olympiakos on loan until the end of the season.
results.title: Kevin Mirallas: Everton forward joins Olympiakos on loan for this season

results.description: Olympiakos celebrate winning the Greek league title with a 5-0 victory on Sunday, but they may still miss out.
results.shortTitle: Olympiakos celebrate, but may lose title
results.title: Olympiakos: Greek club celebrate 44th league title, but may still miss out

results.description: Greek champions Olympiakos defeat Panathinaikos with two late goals in the Athens derby to extend their lead to 20 points.
results.title: Olympiakos 3-1 Panathinaikos

results.description: Fans fight with police as the Athens derby between Panathinaikos and Olympiakos is called off after violence broke out.
results.shortTitle: Athens derby off after fans riot
results.title: Panathinaikos v Olympiakos called off after fans riot
